title: Semi-conductors. Part II. Low frequency amplification
brief_description: Shows the fundamentals of low frequency amplification; electron and hole flow, F-N junction characteristics and transistor symbols; build up of amplifying circuits; an analysis of the operation of the common emitter and common base circuit.
description: Shows the fundamentals of low frequency amplification; electron and hole flow, F-N junction characteristics and transistor symbols; build up of amplifying circuits; an analysis of the operation of the common emitter and common base circuit.
